name: care-monitoring-system
description: Care Monitoring System - система мониторинга и предиктивной аналитики здоровья

scripts.install:all: node -e "const os=require('os'); const {execSync}=require('child_process'); const isWin=os.platform().startsWith('win'); const cmd=isWin? 'powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -File scripts/install-all.ps1' : 'bash scripts/install-all.sh'; execSync(cmd, {stdio:'inherit'});"
scripts.dev:services: concurrently "npm run dev:auth" "npm run dev:user" "npm run dev:device" "npm run dev:telemetry" "npm run dev:alert" "npm run dev:ai-prediction" "npm run dev:integration" "npm run dev:dispatcher-service" "npm run dev:location" "npm run dev:billing" "npm run dev:analytics" "npm run dev:organization"
scripts.dev:frontend: concurrently "npm run dev:guardian" "npm run dev:dispatcher" "npm run dev:admin" "npm run dev:landing"
scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run dev:gateway" "npm run dev:services" "npm run dev:frontend"
